job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
Description:

SEMCON provides a highly qualified, professional, and responsive technical and managerial workforce to satisfy customer requirements that support the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA)'s mission, vision, goals. SEMCON's company culture aligns enriching career experiences, growth opportunities, and collaborative engagement for all SEMCON employees resulting in a company value being greater than the sum of our parts.






Want to be part of our team?




We are searching for a Software Engineer to join our NJ team in Egg Harbor Township supporting software design, development, maintenance, testing and interface of software with computer hardware systems. Experience in RedHat/CentOS or similar Linux Operating Systems is required.




The Software Engineer will have the knowledge, skills, abilities and/or Technical experience (either professional or educational) in all or some of the following areas:

  • Languages: C/C++, Java, or similar object-oriented language
  • Platforms: ActiveMQ , SOA, JMS
  • Operating Systems: Windows, Linux
  • Software: Familiarity with modern repositories such as Subversion or Git, and experience working with XML
  • Adaptability in a software environment
  • SQL or other databases is a plus
  • VMWare/Citrix virtual environments or equivalent is a plus
  • Experience in FAA/NAS Systems is a plus.




Documentation skills, and excellent verbal and written communication skills are required.




Bachelor's Degree in Engineering, Math, Computer Science, or other related discipline, and 3-5 years of experience and the ability to obtain a Security Clearance is required.




This position may require some travel (approx. 10-15-%).




SEMCON offers a competitive salary and complete benefits package which includes health benefits (medical, dental, vision and life), 401K with a generous employer match, paid time off and paid holidays




.

Requirements:
